sentences.en: A wave of self-consciousness can wash over her when someone new enters the room.
sentences.cn: 一有陌生人进房间，她就感到极不自在。

sentences.en: David lost consciousness (= went into a deep sleep ) at eight o’clock and died a few hours later.
sentences.cn: 戴维八点钟失去知觉，几小时后便去世了。

sentences.en: He drifted in and out of consciousness.
sentences.cn: 他时而清醒，时而昏迷。

sentences.en: He was severely injured and never regained consciousness.
sentences.cn: 他严重受伤,再没恢复知觉.

sentences.en: Hypnosis is an altered state of consciousness .
sentences.cn: 催眠状态是一种被改变的意识状态。

sentences.en: I can't remember any more—I must have lost consciousness .
sentences.cn: 我想不起来了—我当时一定是失去了知觉。

sentences.en: Matter can be transformed into consciousness and consciousness into matter.
sentences.cn: 物质可以变成精神,精神可以变成物质.

sentences.en: research into human consciousness
sentences.cn: 对人类意识的研究

sentences.en: Several writers have posited the idea of a universal consciousness.
sentences.cn: 有几个作者都假设存在普遍意识。

sentences.en: She banged her head and lost consciousness.
sentences.cn: 她撞到了头，失去了知觉。

sentences.en: She could faintly hear voices as she began to regain consciousness (= wake up ) .
sentences.cn: 她开始恢复知觉时，隐约听到有人在说话。

sentences.en: She never recovered consciousness.
sentences.cn: 她再也没能恢复意识。

sentences.en: Sooner or later it would happen, strength would change into consciousness.
sentences.cn: 迟早这样的事会发生:力量会变成意识.

sentences.en: The heart monitor shows low levels of consciousness.
sentences.cn: 心脏监测器显示患者神志不清。

sentences.en: The painful memories eventually faded from her consciousness.
sentences.cn: 那些痛苦的回忆最终从她的意识中淡去了。

sentences.en: The patient lost consciousness and went into convulsions.
sentences.cn: 病人失去知觉,开始抽搐起来.

sentences.en: The wounded soldier opened his eyes once, but lost consciousness again immediately.
sentences.cn: 那个伤员睁了一下眼晴随即又昏了过去.

sentences.en: There was very little snobbery or class-consciousness in the wartime navy.
sentences.cn: 战时的海军中很少有势利眼，阶级意识也不强。

sentences.en: When the patient was taken to hospital, he had already lost consciousness.
sentences.cn: 送到医院, 人已经昏迷过去了.

sentences.en: When will she regain consciousness?
sentences.cn: 她什么时候会恢复知觉?

words.tran_cn: 意识到的；故意的；神志清醒的

phrases.tran_cn: 群体意识，团体意识；集体意识
